description: Reusable todo list component for coderef-dashboard with file system persistence
requirements: Create a simple, reusable TodoList component that can be imported anywhere
Support basic operations: add task, remove task, mark complete/incomplete
Persist todos to JSON file using existing file system API
Save todos to todos.json in project directory
Clean, minimal UI that matches dashboard design
Handle loading states and errors gracefully
constraints: Must use existing file system API patterns from dashboard
Component should be framework-agnostic (can be used in any route)
No external dependencies beyond what's already in the project
File operations must respect permissions and handle errors

technical_context.persistence_pattern: Use existing file system API (same pattern as project manager)
technical_context.file_location: todos.json in project root or user-selected directory
technical_context.state_management: Local component state + file system sync

success_criteria: Component can be imported and used in any route
File system errors are handled gracefully
